amendment.description: To require a full audit of the Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System and the Federal reserve banks by the Comptroller General of the United States.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1217, under the order of 10/24/23, having not achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 46 - 51. Record Vote Number: 280.

action.text: Amendment SA 1217 proposed by Senator Paul to Amendment SA 1092. (consideration: CR S5274-5275) To require a full audit of the Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System and the Federal reserve banks by the Comptroller General of the United States.

Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 1217, under the order of 10/24/23, having not achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 46 - 51. Record Vote Number: 280.

Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 1217, under the order of 10/24/23, having not achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 46 - 51. Record Vote Number: 280.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1217 proposed by Senator Paul to Amendment SA 1092.
